title: Engraving of Muslim Marabout - identify process

content.question: Which of the following ideas about spiritual practices in the African diaspora does the engraving most clearly convey?

choices.label: The majority of African Americans descend from Muslim societies in Africa.
Enslaved people in the Americas consistently rejected African Indigenous spiritual beliefs.
Spiritual practices from West and West Central Africa survived in African diasporic religions.
Few of the enslaved people in North America descended from societies in West and West Central Africa.

content.answer: Spiritual practices from West and West Central Africa survived in African diasporic religions.

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
